sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两上名词都有"过剩"或"过量"之意。
means: excess ： 指超过了限度、标准或界线。
surplus ： 通常指数量或量的过剩。

word_mean: 过度，过量，过剩，超过：超过正常、足够或所需的
实，与虚相对而言，指邪气亢盛，以邪气盛为矛盾主要方面的病理反应，表现为正气与邪气均较强盛，正邪相搏，斗争剧烈，反应明显，可见各种亢盛有余的证候。

sentence.Network_en: Polyunsaturated oils are essential for health. Excess is harmful, however.
sentence.Network_cn: 多不饱和油对健康很重要。但是，食用过量就会有害。

sentence.Network_en: Red meat, eaten to excess, is very high in fat and calories.
sentence.Network_cn: 过量食用的红肉中脂肪和卡路里含量很高。

sentence.Network_en: Shake off any excess flour before putting livers in the pan.
sentence.Network_cn: 将多余的面粉抖落干净，再把肝脏放进锅中。

普特英语听力_百度文库 ... emotional a. 感情的，情绪(上)的 excess n. 过分，过量，过剩 expel v. 驱逐，开除，赶出.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... secede 脱离；退出 excess 过度，过剩 excessive 过分的；过度的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... secede 脱离；退出 excess 过度，过剩 excessive 过分的；过度的.

list.abs: 最新汉英特色词汇词典 - 豆丁网 ... Ultra-short wave 超短波 Excessive consumption 超前消费 Outdo oneself 超水品发挥.
...衡（Equilibrium） 、均衡（ ） 51、过剩生产能力（Excess capacity） 、过剩生产能力（ ） 52、扩张路径 Expansion path） 、扩 …
competition是什么意思_百度知道 ... sports competition 运动竞赛 excessive competition 过度竞争 competition rules 比赛规则.
流动性过剩（Excess Liquidity），简单地说，就是货币当局货币发行过多、货币量增长过快，银行机构资金来源充沛，居民储蓄增加 …

jx.jx_en_mean: exceeding the proper amount or degree

lj.lj_ly: she insisted that he did not drink to excess.
lj.lj_ls: 她坚持叫他不要喝过了量。

lj.lj_ly: unit sales in excess of 20 million.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin excessus, from excedere 'go out, surpass' (see exceed)

entry.def: An excess of something is a larger amount than is needed, allowed, or usual.

example.ex: An excess of house plants in a small flat can be oppressive...
example.tran: 在小公寓中摆放过多室内植物会让人觉得很压抑。

example.ex: Polyunsaturated oils are essential for health. Excess is harmful, however.
example.tran: 多不饱和油对健康很重要。但是，食用过量就会有害。

entry.def: Excess is used to describe amounts that are greater than what is needed, allowed, or usual.

example.ex: After cooking the fish, pour off any excess fat...
example.tran: 烹完鱼后，倒掉多余的油。

example.ex: The major reason for excess weight is excess eating.
example.tran: 体重超标的主要原因是饮食过量。

entry.def: Excess is behaviour that is unacceptable because it is considered too extreme or immoral.

example.ex: She said she was sick of her life of excess.
example.tran: 她说她厌倦了自己无节制的生活。

entry.def: Excess is used to refer to additional amounts of money that need to be paid for services and activities that were not originally planned or taken into account.

example.ex: ...a letter demanding an excess fare of £20...
example.tran: 要求额外付20英镑邮资的信

example.ex: Staff who have to travel farther can claim excess travel expenses.
example.tran: 需要到更远的地方出差的职员可以领取额外差旅费。

entry.tran: （保险中的）免赔额，承保人本人需承担的款额
entry.def: The excess on an insurance policy is a sum of money which the insured person has to pay towards the cost of a claim. The insurance company pays the rest.

example.ex: The company wanted £1,800 for a policy with a £500 excess for under-21s.
example.tran: 那家公司想要办理单价1,800英镑的保单，并且要求21岁以下人员承担价值500英镑的免赔额。

entry.def: In excess of means more than a particular amount.

example.ex: Avoid deposits in excess of £20,000 in any one account...
example.tran: 单一账户存款勿超过两万英镑。

example.ex: The energy value of dried fruits is considerably in excess of that of fresh items.
example.tran: 干果的能量值大大超过新鲜水果。

entry.def: If you do something to excess, you do it too much.

example.ex: I was reasonably fit, played a lot of tennis, and didn't smoke or drink to excess...
example.tran: 我相当健康，经常打网球，不怎么吸烟，也不酗酒。

example.ex: Red meat, eaten to excess, is very high in fat and calories.
example.tran: 过量食用的红肉中脂肪和卡路里含量很高。

means.word_mean: 1. a quantity much larger than is needed
2. immoderation as a consequence of going beyond sufficient or permitted limits
3. the state of being more than full
1. more than is needed, desired, or required;

sentences.sentence: "found some extra change lying on the dresser"
"yet another book on heraldry might be thought redundant"
"it was supererogatory of her to gloat"
"extra ribs as well as other supernumerary internal parts"

auth_sentence.content: Remove the lamb and shake off any excess flour.
auth_sentence.res_content: Remove the lamb and shake off any excess flour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remove the lamb and shake off any excess flour.

auth_sentence.content: Tie on with string and trim off any excess.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tie on with string and trim off any excess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tie on with string and trim off any excess.

auth_sentence.content: Press down the edges firmly and trim any excess.
auth_sentence.res_content: Press down the edges firmly and trim any excess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Press down the edges firmly and trim any excess.

stems_affixes.word_buile: access[n.接近;入口 v.存取, 接近]+ible能……的→adj.能接近的;可进去的
access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
excess[n.过度,过剩]+ive……的→adj.过分的;过度的
in不+accessible[adj.能接近的;可进去的]→adj.难以接近的
suc随后+cess行走,前进+ive……的→随后跟上→连续的
access接近+ory表形容词或名词→接近的物→附加物,附属的
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+or人→走在前面的人→祖先
an=ante前+cest=cess行走,前进+ry整体→n.祖先;世系,家世
con共同+cess后退+ion动作或状态→n.让步;退位
ne=need需要+cess行走,前进+ary物→n.必需品

stems_affixes.value_cn: 必要性, 需要,必需品
stems_affixes.word_buile: ne=need需要+cess行走,前进+ity性质,特性等→n.必要性, 需要,必需品
process[n.过程;进行 v.加工, 处理]+ion表名词→向前走的队伍
re回+cess行走,前进→走回去→休息
re回+cess行走,前进+ion动作或状态→走回去→撤退
suc随后+cess行走,前进→随后跟上→继续→继续做→成功

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接连发生,继承, 继任
stems_affixes.word_buile: suc随后+cess行走,前进+ion动作或状态→随后跟上→继续发生→继续别人[事业,成功]→继承, 继任

Sentence.sentence: "Everyone in the U.S. is consuming salt far in excess of what is good for them," says lead author Dr. Kirsten Bibbins-Domingo of UCSF.
If they generate more power than the home is using, the excess flows into the utility's power grid (电网)
They only pay for the excess power that flows into the utility's power grid.
Left alone, it was assumed, the world's rain forests would not only flourish but might even rescue us from disaster by absorbing the excess carbon dioxide and other planet-warming greenhouse gases.
It helps release our excess energy.
Other iced coffees contained more than 450 calories and the majority had an excess of 200.

means.word_mean: 超重的, 过量的; 额外的, 超额的, 附加的, 过度的

sentences.en: You'll have to pay excess postal charges on this letter.
sentences.cn: 这封信你必须付超重邮资。

sentences.en: An excess of fat in one's diet can lead to heart disease.
sentences.cn: 饮食中脂肪过量能导致心脏病。

sentences.en: She was charged an excess of 400 dollars over the amount stated on the bill.
sentences.cn: 向她索取的比账单上显示的数额多400美元。

means.word_mean: 过度, 过分, 过量, 超过

sentences.en: She has an excess of anger.

jushi.english: You'll have to pay excess postal charges on this letter.
jushi.chinese: 这封信你必须付超重邮资。

jushi.english: The company must pay excess profits duty to the government.
jushi.chinese: 公司须向政府缴纳额外所得税。

jushi.english: This excess of losses over profits will ruin the business.
jushi.chinese: 亏损超出盈利会使生意一蹶不振。
